title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Halloween Lands in Los Santos
content:
Today kicks off a monthlong celebration of Halloween happenings on and above the streets of Southern Los Santos, culminating in close encounters of a wholly different kind.

Get into the spirit this week by dispatching foes in the returning Condemned, and check out seasonal Halloween Masks, Facepaints, Car Horns, and Bobbleheads at stores across Los Santos.

And next week, return to North Yankton to dispatch the marching tides of undead in a new Community Challenge available for a limited time.
